QuestionLung: Do you have a medically confirmed lung disease?
QuestionHeart: Do you have a medically diagnosed heart disease?
QuestionInfluenzaVaccination: Have you been vaccinated against influenza in the last few months?
QuestionArticularRheumatism: Have you been diagnosed with rheumatism?
QuestionContact: When did you have contact with a person who tested positive for COVID-19?
QuestionTravelDaysAgo: Have you been to any of the risk areas recently?
QuestionFeverLast4d: Have you had a fever in the last 4 days?
QuestionFatigue: Are you feeling more fatigued than usual?
QuestionDryCough: Do you have a persistent cough?
QuestionRunnyNose: Do you have more or different colds than usual?
QuestionSoreThroat: Do you have a sore throat?
QuestionShortBreath: Are you currently out of breath faster than usual?
QuestionLossOfSmellTaste: Do you experience a loss of smell and taste?
